pageContext.claim: “No, no. I don't care if they're public; they should be public. What I said -- it was misreported, as usual. What I said is very simple: There shouldn't be anything. There shouldn't be impeachment hearings, is what I said. So maybe they misconstrued it.”
pageContext.analysis: This is gaslighting. Trump and Republicans repeatedly complained that Democrats were deposing witnesses in the impeachment inquiry behind closed doors. But then Democrats held public, televised hearings with the same officials.
